  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(java.lang.String imageURL, Board board, float x, float y, float movementSpeed)
      Constructor for the Entity object which extends Player.
      Parameters:
      imageURL - URL to an image to use for the entity (Stored as a Texture)
      board - The gameboard
      x - X coordinate of the entity
      y - Y coordimate of the entity
      movementSpeed - Movement speed of the entity

  • Method Details

    • setAnimation

      public void setAnimation​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> animation)
      Parameters:
      animation - Sets the current animation (Ie. walkingLeft) If the current animation is set to null the entity will display the defaultImage (Ie. standing still)

    • setAnimationDirection

      public void setAnimationDirection​(java.lang.String direction)
      Called within player controller, sets the animation if walking in a direction
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction of the player (If null standing still)

    • move

      public boolean move()
      Moves the entity according to the direction of current travel
      Returns:
      Returns false if the entity is unable to move (Used for enemies finding new direction)

    • validMove

      public boolean validMove​(Tile point1, Tile point2, float tempX, float tempY)
      Parameters:
      point1 - Square corner of player is in
      point2 - Square other corner of player is in (Ie. if moving down, both bottom corners)
      tempX - X position the player is moving into
      tempY - Y position the player is moving into
      Returns:
      If the player is able to move without adjustement (Corner cutting)

    • possibleCornerCut

      public void possibleCornerCut​(Tile point1, Tile point2, float tempX, float tempY, java.lang.String direction)
      Adjusts for "corner cutting" if the player isnt lined up correctly will adjust the values to allow them to continue moving (If one point is moving onto a path, but the other is hitting a wall)
      Parameters:
      point1 - Square corner of player is in
      point2 - Square other corner of player is in (Ie. if moving down, both bottom corners)
      tempX - X position the player is moving into
      tempY - Y position the player is moving into
      direction - Direction of movement

    • Draw

      public void Draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Draws the entity on the board, either with an animation or an image
      Parameters:
      batch - Spritebatch which displays all of the stuff in the driver

    • reduceHealth

      public void reduceHealth()
      Reducing the health method Produces the sound if the entity has one

    • isAlive

      public java.lang.Boolean isAlive()
      Method to check if the player is alive
      Returns:
      false if dead, true if alive

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth​(int health)
      Method for setting the health
      Parameters:
      health - number of lives

      public void increaseLastDamaged()
      Sees when's the last damage inflicted and increases the timer

      Parameters:
